contest-event.event-date:
Sept. 19, 1903 D Altofts Contest
Altofts Contest 0 Own Choice Test Piece Contest
altofts-contest
None
Own Choice Test Piece Contest
Altofts, Normanton, West Yorkshire Prizes - 1st £10, 2nd £5, 3rd £3, 4th £1.10s. Best trombone - Thornhill. Best cornet, euphonium and horn - Castleford Subscription. March contest - 1st Castleford, 2nd Rotherham. 8 bands competed.
June 22, 2013, 12:24 p.m. June 22, 2013, 12:49 p.m.
1 Thornhill Brass James Brooke Gems of Welsh Melody
2 Castleford New Subscription J. W. Stamp Don Sebastiano [arr. Godfrey]
3 Rotherham Borough Alexander Owen Don Sebastiano [arr. Godfrey]
4 Wallace Arnold (Rothwell) Band William Heap Gems of Welsh Melody
Unknown Result Nazebottom Temperance Unknown Le Domino Noir [unknown arranger]
